text: int main ( ) { int t ; int n , max , sum , x , k ; int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; if ( t > 1000 || t < 1 ) return 0 ; while ( t -- ) { max = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; if ( n > 100 || n < 0 ) continue ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ) ; if ( a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] > 99 || a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] < 0 ) return 0 ; } } for ( k = n - 1 ; k >= 0 ; k -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < k ; j ++ ) { sum = 0 ; for ( i = k ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { if ( i == ( k ) ) { sum += a [ i ] [ j ] > a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ? a [ i ] [ j ] : a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ; } else { x = j <= i ? 0 : ( j - i ) ; sum += a [ i ] [ j - x ] ; } } if ( sum > max ) max = sum ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
